baseSalary.title: Base Salary
baseSalary.description: The base salary of the job or of an employee in an EmployeeRole.

datePosted.title: Date Posted
datePosted.description: Publication date of an online listing.

educationRequirements.title: Education Requirements
educationRequirements.description: Educational background needed for the position or Occupation.

eligibilityToWorkRequirement.title: Eligibility to Work Requirement
eligibilityToWorkRequirement.description: The legal requirements such as citizenship, visa and other documentation required for an applicant to this job.

employerOverview.title: Employer Overview
employerOverview.description: A description of the employer, career opportunities and work environment for this position.

employmentType.title: Employment Type
employmentType.description: Type of employment (e.g. full-time, part-time, contract, temporary, seasonal, internship).

estimatedSalary.title: Estimated Salary
estimatedSalary.description: An estimated salary for a job posting or occupation, based on a variety of variables including, but not limited to industry, job title, and location. Estimated salaries  are often computed by outside organizations rather than the hiring organization, who may not have committed to the estimated value.

experienceInPlaceOfEducation.title: Experience in Place of Education
experienceInPlaceOfEducation.description: Indicates whether a JobPosting will accept experience (as indicated by OccupationalExperienceRequirements) in place of its formal educational qualifications (as indicated by educationRequirements). If true, indicates that satisfying one of these requirements is sufficient.

experienceRequirements.title: Experience Requirements
experienceRequirements.description: Description of skills and experience needed for the position or Occupation.

incentiveCompensation.title: Incentive Compensation
incentiveCompensation.description:
Description of bonus and commission compensation aspects of the job.
                 Supersedes 
                
    
    
    incentives.

industry.title: Industry
industry.description: The industry associated with the job position.

jobBenefits.title: Job Benefits
jobBenefits.description:
Description of benefits associated with the job.
                 Supersedes 
                
    
    
    benefits.

jobImmediateStart.title: Job Immediate Start
jobImmediateStart.description: An indicator as to whether a position is available for an immediate start.

jobLocationType.title: Job Location Type
jobLocationType.description: A description of the job location (e.g TELECOMMUTE for telecommute jobs).

jobStartDate.title: Job Start Date
jobStartDate.description: The date on which a successful applicant for this job would be expected to start work. Choose a specific date in the future or use the jobImmediateStart property to indicate the position is to be filled as soon as possible.

occupationalCategory.title: Occupational Category
occupationalCategory.description:
A category describing the job, preferably using a term from a taxonomy such as BLS O*NET-SOC, ISCO-08 or similar, with the property repeated for each applicable value. Ideally the taxonomy should be identified, and both the textual label and formal code for the category should be provided.

Note: for historical reasons, any textual label and formal code provided as a literal may be assumed to be from O*NET-SOC.

physicalRequirement.title: Physical Requirement
physicalRequirement.description: A description of the types of physical activity associated with the job. Defined terms such as those in O*net may be used, but note that there is no way to specify the level of ability as well as its nature when using a defined term.

qualifications.title: Qualifications
qualifications.description: Specific qualifications required for this role or Occupation.

responsibilities.title: Responsibilities
responsibilities.description: Responsibilities associated with this role or Occupation.

salaryCurrency.title: Salary Currency
salaryCurrency.description: The currency (coded using ISO 4217 ) used for the main salary information in this job posting or for this employee.

securityClearanceRequirement.title: Security Clearance Requirement
securityClearanceRequirement.description: A description of any security clearance requirements of the job.

sensoryRequirement.title: Sensory Requirement
sensoryRequirement.description: A description of any sensory requirements and levels necessary to function on the job, including hearing and vision. Defined terms such as those in O*net may be used, but note that there is no way to specify the level of ability as well as its nature when using a defined term.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: A statement of knowledge, skill, ability, task or any other assertion expressing a competency that is desired or required to fulfill this role or to work in this occupation.

specialCommitments.title: Special Commitments
specialCommitments.description: Any special commitments associated with this job posting. Valid entries include VeteranCommit, MilitarySpouseCommit, etc.

totalJobOpenings.title: Total Job Openings
totalJobOpenings.description: The number of positions open for this job posting. Use a positive integer. Do not use if the number of positions is unclear or not known.

validThrough.title: Valid Through
validThrough.description: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.

workHours.title: Work Hours
workHours.description: The typical working hours for this job (e.g. 1st shift, night shift, 8am-5pm).
